author: markt
msg: Install script no longer references these files.

author: markt
msg: Update to use NSIS version 2. Only uses new features where required
to get installer task to complete. Some minor changes in behaviour but
otherwise remains consistent with previous behaviour.
Updating to version 2 to allow me to fix a bug in the installer without
having to swap between NSIS versions for TC4 and TC5.

author: markt
msg: Fix bug 22176. Allow username and/or password to start and/or end in a space
. This is required by section 2 of RFC2617.
Remove unused imports identified by Eclipse.

author: markt
msg: Fix bug 21790. Modify noshade references to align with XHTML reference guide.
Removed unused imports identified by Eclipse.

author: markt
msg: Fix bug21566. Update server-noexamples.xml to use coyote connectors.
